article_title: Podesta's Climate And Environmental Agendas Will Add To Obama's Executive Disorders

article_metadata.description: Podesta can be expected to push Obama to act upon his executive authority to circumvent a Congress which the administration sees as unwilling and unable to pass legislation on climate change or much else.
article_metadata.author: Larry Bell
